scripts.test_compiler: npm run compile_compiler && ((PATH="./build/emscripten:$PATH" node ./src/build/voxelscript_compiler.js ./tests/voxelscript_test --cpp-file=./tests/build/main.cpp -o ./tests/build/a.out && time -f'%E' ./tests/build/a.out && echo) || true)
scripts.compile_compiler: echo Compiling VoxelScript Compiler && cd src && npx tsc && cp voxelscript.pegjs *.hpp base_ts.ts build_tsconfig.json build && cd ..
scripts.compile_extension: ./scripts/update_iro.sh && echo Compiling VoxelScript Extension && cd voxelscript_extension && npm run compile && cd ..
scripts.install_extension: npm run install_language_server && npm run compile_extension
